title: Pizzakaya
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Pizza, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. California style pizzas shop. Has a separate menu for vegetarians.  Pizza dough used is vegan as of Apr 2016. Try the salad with the vegan version of the house dressing. Uses organic vegetables and has vegan cheese available. Also has a gluten free crust available for the small size pizza.
